20:42 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
20:43 <+sburjan`> sdumitriu: how did you fixed the chain reply comment issue ?  
20:58 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
21:36 <@sdumitriu> sburjan`: By default Velocity has a limit on the number of nested macro calls  
21:36 <@sdumitriu> I increased that limit from 20 to 100  
21:36 <@sdumitriu> It's not the best solution, but it was fast  
21:36 <+sburjan`> I see  
21:37 <+sburjan`> so if I add 100 will still fail, right ?  
21:37 <+sburjan`> IMO we should put a limit  
21:37 <@sdumitriu> Yes, it will fail at the 197th reply  
21:38 <@cjdelisle> At that point the error message should say something about whether it's really worth it and maybe going out and getting some sun.  
21:38 <+sburjan`> :))  
21:38 <+sburjan`> yeah  
21:50 <tmortagne> has quit
